name: Abduct. Probe. Release. (Prototype)
description:
This is an early prototype for the old school eight bit alien abduction game I've always wanted to play. You use the keyboard or a controller to fly your saucer around the side-scrolling farmland trying to abduct cows to terraform a home planet. See, your species breathes methane and global warming is your friend. Win, win for us.

This game is not finished but I haven't touched it in a few years and just wanted to put it out there. I have a bunch of ideas (think Choplifter) and new artwork (updated cows, mothership, barns) done but just no time to get it implemented. 

So let me know what you think. Maybe I'll make time if anyone is into this kind of thing.
